title: Question 1
prompt: Which of the following would have the greatest impact on the ecosystem?
description:
Click the one best answer to each question.

A food web shows relationships between living things in an ecosystem. Each type of plant and animal is affected by the population of plants and animals that make up its food supply. The following food web shows some of the relationships in a grassland environment.
feedback: The loss of grass would take away the food supply for both the deer and the insects. Without insects to eat, the spider population would move or die. Without insects and spiders, the shrew population would move or die. Without shrews, spiders, or insects, the owl population would move or die. Without owls, shrews, or deer, the mountain lion population would move or die. The destruction of the grass could destroy the entire food web.
